Caustic
namespace
Caustic
CImageIter
CImageIter
CImageIter1
CImageIter16
CImageIter24
CImageIter32
and 2 other children
CImageIter8
CImageIterGeneric

Defines an iterator for walking across the pixels in an image.  CImageIter defines the base class. Clients need to used one of the derived classes (CImageIter1, CImageIter8, CImageIter16, CImageIter24, or CImageIter32) to walk across an image.

Example
CImageIter24 rowSrc(pSrcImage, 0, 0);
CImageIter24 rowDst(pDestImage, 0, 0);
for (int y = 0; y < pSrcImage->GetHeight(); y++)
{
    CImageIter24 colSrc = rowSrc;
    CImageIter24 colDst = rowDst;
    for (int x = 0; x < pSrcImage->GetWidth(); x++)
    {
        colDst.SetRed(colSrc.GetRed() - 10);
        colDst.SetGreen(colSrc.GetGreen() - 10);
        colDst.SetBlue(colSrc.GetBlue() - 10);
        colSrc.Step(CImageIter::Right);
        colDst.Step(CImageIter::Right);
    }
    rowSrc.Step(CImageIter::Down);
    rowDst.Step(CImageIter::Down);
}
CImageIter1
public
CImageIter
CImageIter1

Defines an iterator for walking across the pixels in an image where each pixel is 1 bit in width.

CImageIter8
public
CImageIter
CImageIter8

Defines an iterator for walking across the pixels in an image where each pixel is 8 bits in width.

CImageIter16
public
CImageIter
CImageIter16

Defines an iterator for walking across the pixels in an image where each pixel is 16 bits in width.

CImageIter24
public
CImageIter
CImageIter24

Defines an iterator for walking across the pixels in an image where each pixel is 24 bits in width.

CImageIter32
public
CImageIter
CImageIter32

Defines an iterator for walking across the pixels in an image where each pixel is 32 bits in width.

CImageIterGeneric
public
CImageIter
CImageIterGeneric

Defines an iterator for walking across the pixels in an image of arbitrary pixel depth. NOTE: These iterators are slower than using the iterator that matches the given image's pixel depth.
